title: About
text:
Sérgio worked at the Department of Demographic and Social Statistics of Statistics Portugal where he was responsible for the production of the Well-being index of Portugal. He worked in Statistics Portugal since 1990, mainly on statistical metadata, regional statistics studies and official statistics dissemination.



Degree in Economics (1977)
Faculdade de Economia do Porto
Degree in Sociology (2000)
ISCTE-IUL
Provas de Aptidão Pedagógica e Capacidade Científica (2008)
Faculdade de Economia do Porto

title: Sérgio Bacelar
text:
Welcome
Sérgio is currently a PhD candidate of Complexity Sciences (FCUL-University of Lisbon/ISCTE-University Institute of Lisbon) and he has a degree in Economics by U. Porto and in Sociology by University Institute of Lisbon.


Skills

R Programming
Statistics
Photography
